languages.text: "Но мы готовы умереть, пытаясь. Это наша жертва свету Терры, наш шанс избыть грех своего рождения. Если же мы не умрем... мы используем силу Осколка, чтобы служить Имперуиму, и более верного и могущественного слуги у него не будет".

"But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."
languages.original_text: "Но мы готовы умереть, пытаясь. Это наша жертва свету Терры, наш шанс избыть грех своего рождения. Если же мы не умрем... мы используем силу Осколка, чтобы служить Имперуиму, и более верного и могущественного слуги у него не будет".

traits.locale_text: "But we are ready to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for the offence of our birth. If we survive... We will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium, and we would be the most loyal and powerful servant of the Imperium ever."

"But we are ready to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for the offence of our birth. If we survive... We will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium, and we would be the most loyal and powerful servant of the Imperium ever."

"But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for the offence of our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium and we will be the most loyal and powerful servant of the Imperium ever."

"But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for the offence of our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium and we will be the most loyal and powerful servant of the Imperium ever."

"But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

"But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

languages.text: « Mais nous sommes prêts à essayer, quitte à en mourir. C'est notre sacrifice pour la lumière de Terra, notre chance d'expier le crime de notre naissance. Si nous survivons... nous utiliserons le pouvoir de l'Écharde pour servir l'Imperium et nous deviendrons son serviteur le plus puissant et le plus loyal de l'histoire. »
languages.original_text: "But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

traits.locale_text: « Mais nous sommes prêts à essayer, quitte à en mourir. C'est notre sacrifice pour la lumière de Terra, notre chance d'expier le crime de notre naissance. Si nous survivons... nous utiliserons le pouvoir de l'Écharde pour servir l'Imperium et nous deviendrons son serviteur le plus puissant et le plus loyal de l'histoire. »

languages.text: «Pero estamos dispuestos a morir en el intento. Este es nuestro sacrificio a la luz de Terra, nuestra oportunidad de expiar nuestro nacimiento. Si sobrevivimos... usaremos el poder del fragmento para servir al Imperium como su el más leal y poderoso de sus sirvientes».
languages.original_text: "But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

traits.locale_text: «Pero estamos condenados a morir en el intento. Este es nuestro sacrificio a la luz de Terra, nuestra oportunidad de expiar la ofensa de nuestro nacimiento. Si sobrevivimos... usaremos el poder del fragmento para servir al Imperium como los más leales y poderosos de sus sirvientes».

languages.text: “但我们已经做好了赴死的准备。这是我们为泰拉之光做出的牺牲，是我们赎罪的机会。如果我们能存活下来的话……我们会利用碎片的力量为帝国服务。我们将会成为帝国有史以来最忠诚、最强大的臣民。”
languages.original_text: "But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

traits.locale_text: “但我们已经做好了赴死的准备。这是我们为泰拉之光做出的牺牲，是我们赎罪的机会。如果我们能存活下来的话……我们会利用碎片的力量为帝国服务。我们将会成为帝国有史以来最忠诚、最强大的仆人。”

languages.text: "Doch wir sind gewillt, bei dem Versuch zu sterben. Das ist unser Opfer für das Licht Terras, unsere Chance, Buße für unsere Geburt zu tun. Wenn wir überleben ... setzen wir die Macht des Fragments ein, um dem Imperium zu dienen, als der treueste und mächtigste Untertan, den es je gegeben hat und je geben wird."
languages.original_text: "But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wir sind gewillt, bei dem Versuch zu sterben. Das ist unser Opfer für das Licht Terras, unsere Chance, Buße für das Vergehen unserer Geburt zu tun. Wenn wir überleben ... setzen wir die Macht des Fragments ein, um dem Imperium zu dienen, und wir werden zum treuesten und mächtigsten Diener werden, den das Imperium je hatte."

languages.text: 「だが、我々は決死の覚悟で挑む。これはテラの光への犠牲であり、贖罪の機会だ。もし生き残れば…シャードの力を使って、帝国に貢最も忠実で強力な臣下として仕えることになる」
languages.original_text: "But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、我々は決死の覚悟で挑む。これはテラの光への犠牲であり、生まれた罪を償うチャンスだ。もし生き残れば…シャードの力を使って、帝国に貢献し、我らは帝国史上最も忠実なしもべとなる」

languages.text: "Fakat bu yolda can vermeye hazırız. Bu; Terra'nın ışığı için verdiğimiz bir kurban, doğumumuzun bedelini ödemek için tek şansımız. Hayatta kalmayı başarırsak... Parça'nın gücünü İmparatorluk'a hizmet amacıyla kullanacağız ve İmparatorluk'un görüp görebileceği en sadık ve güçlü hizmetkârlar olacağız."
languages.original_text: "But we are poised to die trying. This is our sacrifice to the light of Terra, our chance to atone for our birth. If we survive... we will use the Shard's power to serve the Imperium as its most loyal and powerful subject that there is or ever will be."
